Name: Save Halloween: City of Witches
About the game: The servants of Lucifer stole the Stone of the Dead and opened the gates of the Hell! You are to fight with Lucifer and restore the Stone of the Dead before rising of the bloody moon! Otherwise, Lucifer will gain power over the world and the dark forces will remain forever in the world of the living. Buy more than 40 magical items for your home. Magic gameplay More than 100 exciting levels. 9 locations with the search of the words Get all the awards Original graphic arts
